articles.title: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka: Do-or-Die Clash Decides Super 8 Fate in T20 World Cup 2026
articles.snippet: Pakistan face co-hosts Sri Lanka in a must-win final Super 8 Group 2 match at Pallekele. ICC has outlined the exact NRR margin needed for Pakistan to overtake New Zealand and reach the semi-finals.
articles.author: YoSinTV

articles.title: Champions League Last 16 Draw: Real Madrid vs Man City Rematch, PSG Face Chelsea
articles.snippet: The UEFA Champions League round of 16 draw delivered blockbuster ties: Real Madrid take on Manchester City again, PSG meet Chelsea, Arsenal draw Bayer Leverkusen, and Newcastle face Barcelona.
articles.author: YoSinTV

articles.title: England Qualify for T20 World Cup 2026 Semi-Finals After Thrilling Win Over New Zealand
articles.snippet: England sealed their semi-final spot with a dramatic victory over New Zealand in Colombo. Harry Brook's form and late hitting from Will Jacks and Rehan Ahmed secured the win.
articles.author: YoSinTV

articles.title: Premier League Matchday Live: Arsenal vs Chelsea Headlines Weekend Fixtures
articles.snippet: A packed Premier League weekend features Arsenal hosting Chelsea in a top-of-the-table clash, Leeds vs Manchester City, and more. Wolves stunned Aston Villa 2-0 in the West Midlands derby yesterday.
articles.author: YoSinTV

articles.title: India Keep Semi-Final Hopes Alive with Dominant Win Over Zimbabwe in T20 World Cup
articles.snippet: India thrashed Zimbabwe to revive their campaign in Super 8 Group 1. They now face a high-stakes clash with West Indies, with potential India-Pakistan semi-final or final scenarios still possible.
articles.author: YoSinTV

articles.title: Premier League Power Rankings: Chelsea Rise, Liverpool Slip in Latest Update
articles.snippet: Chelsea climb in the latest Premier League power rankings thanks to strong performances, while Liverpool drop amid inconsistent form. Crystal Palace continue their impressive run.
articles.author: YoSinTV
